short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that supports the Ahero app. Get focused by blocking sites, planning your day, and setting long term goals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that supports the Windows version of the Ahero app. Get focused by blocking sites, planning your day, and setting long term goals.
